request.title: See Your Pitch Accuracy in Real-Time (No More Guessing)
request.hook: Every guitarist thinks they're in tune. Here's proof you're not.
request.core_takeaway: Traditional tuners show you're 'close enough' - but close enough isn't music. This app shows your EXACT pitch in 100-cent resolution with color-coded feedback: green means perfect, yellow means close, red means you're drifting. Students learn to HEAR pitch differences by SEEING them first.
request.payoff_cta: Stop guessing. Start seeing. Link in bio for early access.
